metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7032 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
webcheckout in myrepos through 1.20171231 does not sanitize URLs that are passed to git clone, allowing a malicious website operator or a MitM attacker to take advantage of it for arbitrary code execution, as demonstrated by an "ext::sh -c" attack or an option injection attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

myrepos - 1.20180726
No subscription required

criterions.comment: myrepos package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.20180726').
